title: Too Faced Cosmetics, Shadow Insurance, 0.35 Ounce
description: Your full-coverage insurance policy against all fading, creasing, melting, blurring, oil slicked andhard-to-blend eye-shadow accidents. Our silicone based eye-shadow primer transforms any eyeshadow into a perfectly blendable, color-drenched, intensified version of its self, then locks it downperfectly ‘till you take it off. Our skin soothing formula evens out the skin tone on your lids andsmoothes out lines while it secures a barrier between the oils of your skin and your makeup, so noshadow catastrophes will ever happen again. "Thank you Shadow Insurance, I can sleep better atnight knowing you're on my side!"-

title: Nioxin System 3 Cleanser & Scalp Therapy Conditioner Treated Hair Set Duo 33.8 oz
description: Product Description Nioxin System 3 uses a moisturizing infusion of rare, protective herbs and botanicals that help to safeguard the scalp from drying irritation caused by various chemical services. This system addresses problems associated with noticeably thin-looking hair and allows you to maintain a healthy scalp environment for fuller, thicker, healthier-looking hair.

title: Nioxin System 3 Scalp Treamtment 6.8 fl oz
description: Nioxin - Scalp Treatment #3 - Chemically Enhanced Hair - Normal To Thin Looking Activates the scalp and hair by breaking-down the sebum containing environmental residues and DHT, and delivers vitamins and nutrients to the scalp and hair. BioAMP adds thickness from inside the cuticle and strengthens the hair shaft. Glyco-Color Shield provides Clinically Proven color protection for hair and helps safeguard the scalp from the drying effects of chemical services. Transactive Delivery System is a time released delivery system formulated with vitamins that provide moisturizing nourishment for the scalp and hair. (6.8 oz)

title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Mineral Lipstick - Rosy Raisin
description: Now you can hydrate your lips and get a lasting soft color naturally! This nourishing blend of exotic oils, natural waxes, vitamins and plant extracts create the perfect moisturizing formula. The sleek lipstick has superior color payoff, glides easily onto lips, and is long wearing. Lips stay perfectly hydrated and soft throughout the day for no fuss, lip loving happiness. All mineral makeup is 100% mineral based with no parabens, no preservatives and no chemical dyes.

title: e.l.f. Corrective Concealer, Erase and Conceal, 0.19 Ounce
description: Conceals under-eye darkness, blemishes and other skin imperfections with customized coverage. Brightens under-eye circles and neutralizes redness. Convenient size for on-the-go travel.
